Title: Sports of New China
Publisher: Renmin tiyu chubanshe (人民体育出版社) Beijing
Notes: The calligraphy on the right side is a 1952 quote by Mao Zedong, "Develop sports, strengthen the people's physique" (发展体育运动，增强人民体质). He wrote this for the inaugural meeting of the All-China Sports Federation (中华全国体育总会). On the left side is calligraphy by Zhu De.
